title: WTB - T202 Engle in a Close Play - Engle/Speaker
author: jayshum

posts.post_title: WTB - T202 Engle in a Close Play - Engle/Speaker
posts.post_content: I am looking for a T202 Engle in a Close Play - Engle/Speaker.  Raw or graded, lower grade preferred but will consider higher grade depending on price.  PM me or email me at [url]jandcristi@verizon.net[/url] if you have one available.
Bump - still looking.  Need this last T202 to finish my set.
